translation.en: the best-kept secret this side of, well, anywhere.
translation.ko: 놀랍고 멋진 비밀이 곳곳에 숨어있는 섬

translation.en: Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock
packs more than a few surprises.
Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart.
translation.ko: 이곳 생활은 끝내주는데 겁쟁이에겐 악몽의 섬이다

translation.en: You see, where most folks enjoy hobbies like whittling or needlepoint,
translation.ko: 대부분 바이킹들은 취미로 나무를 깎거나 자수를 놓지만

translation.en: a little something we like to call
I'm sorry, Fishlegs. Did you want that?
Did I tell you that you look amazing today, because you do.
translation.ko: 오늘 너 예쁘다고 내가 말했니? 정말 예뻐

translation.en: Ugh. Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here.
translation.ko: 가자, 바프 어디서 아부 냄새가 나네

translation.en: Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch!
translation.ko: 꿈 깨라, 네가 싫대 여길 빨리 벗어나자, 벨치!

translation.en: Ha-ha! That's nine for the Twins,
Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with none.
Scared him off with the big talk, didn't you, Stoick?
translation.ko: 잔뜩 부담을 줘서 히컵이 달아난 거지?

translation.en: She's my princess. Whatever she wants, she gets.
translation.ko: 나의 공주님이잖아 뭐든 다 해주고 싶어

translation.en: [Astrid] Ruffnut? Didn't she try to bury you alive?
[Hiccup] Now, dragons used to be a bit of a problem here,
translation.ko: 한때는 드래곤이 지독한 골칫거리였지만 그건 5년 전 일이다

translation.en: but that was five years ago.
Now, they have all moved in. And really, why wouldn't they?
translation.ko: 이젠 한 가족이 됐다 당연한 일이지
맘껏 먹을 수 있는 무한 리필 뷔페도 있고

translation.en: even top-of-the-line fire prevention if I do say so myself.
translation.ko: 내 입으로 말하기 쑥스럽지만 최첨단 소방 시설도 갖췄다

translation.en: The Black Sheep! Come on, Stormfly.
We can still win this thing!
[Fishlegs] Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Here you go, darling. Mine is worth ten.
[Astrid] You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?
Whoo! No one can stop me now!
Except for me. We're attached, genius.
translation.ko: 날 빼면 그렇겠지 우린 하나잖아, 멍청아!

translation.en: -Quit trying to steal all my glory! -Hey!
-[Tuffnut] It's my glory! -[Ruffnut] Always ruining everything!
translation.ko: - 승리의 영광은 내 거야! - 넌 항상 망치기만 해 양 없이는 영광도 없어!
양 없이는 영광도 없어! 가로채기 성공!

translation.en: [Hiccup] Yep, Berk is pretty much perfect.
All of my hard work has paid off.
And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons…
translation.ko: 또 하나 멋진 건... 우리는 드래곤과 날면서 더 큰 세상을 알게 됐다

translation.en: -[Astrid] Whoo-hoo! -[exclaims in shock] …the world just got a whole lot bigger.
translation.ko: 우리는 드래곤과 날면서 더 큰 세상을 알게 됐다

translation.en: So what do you think, bud?
You wanna give this another shot?
That really came out of nowhere.
We got to work on your solo gliding there, bud.
translation.ko: 너 혼자 하는 비행도 훈련해야 해

translation.en: makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, hey?
Looks like we found another one, bud.
Oh, what, do you want an apology?
Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo?
Oh, you feeling it yet? Huh?
Picking up on all of my heartfelt remorse? [grunting]
translation.ko: 아까 한 말 내가 후회하는 거 알지?

translation.en: You're right! You're right! You win. You win.

translation.ko: 드래곤 대 바이킹! 옛날처럼 다시 적이 돼서

translation.en: locked in combat to the bitter… Oh!
You know that doesn't wash out.
So, what should we name it?
Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods?
translation.ko: 팀버잭 드래곤이 저 숲속에 있는 걸까?

translation.en: The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks?
Who knows? Maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury.
[sighs] So, what do you say? Just keep going?

translation.ko: 레이싱 이겼어 딴 일이 뭐 있겠니?

translation.en: I wake up. The sun is shining.
Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop.
thinking all is right with the world and I get,
[imitating Hiccup] "Not now, Dad. I got a whole day "of goofing off to get started." [snickers]
Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that.
And second, what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders?
translation.ko: 그리고 내가 말할 때 어깨를 들썩인다고?

translation.en: Yeah, that's a truly flattering impersonation.
translation.ko: 그래, 방금 그 흉내 웃기긴 했어

translation.en: [imitating Stoick] "You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder."
[laughing] When have I ever done that with my hands?
"and since no chief could ask for a better successor,
Oh, my gods! Hiccup, that's amazing!
You're gonna wear out the spring coil. The calibration is very sensitive.
this is what I'm dealing with.
I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone.
translation.ko: 아무 말 안 하고 한눈파실 때 도망쳤어

translation.en: The map will have to wait for sure,
translation.ko: 보나 마나 지도 제작도 늦어질 거고

translation.en: and I'll need to fly Toothless, since you'll be too busy, but…
translation.ko: 넌 바쁠 테니 내가 투슬리스와 지내야겠지?

translation.en: All those speeches and planning, and running the village, that's his thing.
translation.ko: 수많은 연설을 하고 섬나라를 통치하는 일이라니

translation.en: I think you're missing the point.
translation.ko: 네가 중요한 걸 놓치고 있는 거야

translation.en: You know exactly who you are.
I know that I'm not my father,
and I never met my mother,
so what does that make me?
What you're searching for isn't out there, Hiccup.
translation.ko: 네가 찾는 답은 저 멀리 있지 않아

translation.en: Maybe you just don't see it yet.
translation.ko: 아직 그걸 못 보고 있을 뿐이야

translation.en: Is that what I think it is?
I thought they were all gone for good.
It looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads.
Don't think Drago has one of those
Look, we don't want any trouble.
You should have thought of that before you stole all of our dragons,
and blasted our fort to bits!
[scoffs] Dragon trapping is hard enough work as it is without do-gooder dragon riders
You mean other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me.
translation.ko: 어제 여길 털어 간 네 친구 말고?

translation.en: You may have an ice-spitting dragon on your side,
but we still have a quota to fill.
How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?
Drago what-fist? Does anything you say make sense?
He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.
translation.ko: 그는 내일까지 군대를 채울 드래곤을 바치길 원해

translation.en: And Drago don't take well to excuses.
This is what he gave me
last time I showed up empty-handed.
translation.ko: 전에 빈손으로 갔다가 벌 받은 거야

translation.en: He promised to be far less understanding in the future.
All right, look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief
translation.ko: 우린 드래곤 도둑에 관해 아는 게 없고

translation.en: or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay?
translation.ko: 미친 네 두목과 드래곤 군대도 전혀 모르는 일이야

translation.en: Just give us back our dragon and we'll go,
strange, hostile person whom we've never met.
translation.ko: 한 성깔 하는 난생처음 보는 친구

translation.en: it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury.
This is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.
You will never hold on to those dragons,
translation.ko: 넌 언젠가는 드래곤을 다 잃을 거야

translation.en: Drago is coming for them all!
Hey, how are you? Beautiful day.
Ah! He's probably flown off the edge of the world by now.
translation.ko: 너무 오래 안 보인다 싶긴 해

translation.en: Are you sure you want that kid running the village?
You can still delay your retirement.
Who finally decided to show up for work. Yay.
Hey, Dad, could I have a word?
Something you're itching to tell me?
Not quite the itch you're thinking of, but yes.
translation.ko: 그 정도는 아니지만 할 말이 있어요
좋아! 1교시부터 시작하자 족장의 첫 번째 의무는 백성을 지키는 거야, 41번?

translation.en: A chief's first duty is to his people, so, 41?
translation.ko: 족장의 첫 번째 의무는 백성을 지키는 거야, 41번?

translation.en: That's me! That's me! I'm next!
Excuse me. I have been here all day.
Okay, okay. I want one of those high seaters
with lots of spikes and a big stowage compartment.
translation.ko: 큰 사물함이 달린 높은 안장을 줘요

translation.en: This is actually a little more important than building saddles.
translation.ko: 안장 만드는 일보다 훨씬 중요한 거예요

translation.en: Lesson two. No task is too small when it comes to serving your people.
translation.ko: 2교시, 백성을 섬길 땐 작은 일도 정성껏 해라

translation.en: Excuse us, Grump. Dad, can we just talk…
translation.ko: - 미안하다, 그럼프! - 제발 얘기 좀 해요

translation.en: You let the forge die down again!
[Gobber] That's it, Grump. You're going up for adoption.
translation.ko: 더는 못 참아! 입양 보내 버려야지

translation.en: There you go. Go on. Have away.
translation.ko: - 아버지, 얘기 좀... - 너도 어서 골라잡아

translation.en: Seriously, I really need to tell you about this new land we came across.
translation.ko: 새로 발견한 땅에 관해 할 말이 있어요

translation.en: We didn't stick around to find out.
Oh, really? Your Night Fury and Deadly Nadder
translation.ko: 그래? 드래곤들을 두 팔 벌려 환영하지 않았나 봐?

translation.en: didn't bring them cheering to the rooftops?
translation.ko: 드래곤들을 두 팔 벌려 환영하지 않았나 봐?

translation.en: Not the standard run-for-the-hills hoo-ha I've come to enjoy.
You should have seen their fort.
All blown apart and stuck in giant spikes of ice. It was weird!
I've never seen anything like it.
And worst of all, they thought we did it!
translation.ko: 게다가 그게 우리 짓인 줄 알더라고요!

translation.en: You two are gonna get yourselves in serious trouble one of these days.
translation.ko: 그렇게 쏘다니다가 둘 다 위험에 빠질라

translation.en: Not everyone appreciates this way of life.
translation.ko: 우리가 사는 방식을 누구나 좋아하진 않아

translation.en: Best we keep to our own.
Besides, you'll have more important uses for your time.
translation.ko: 그리고 너는 앞날을 더 값지게 써야지

translation.en: Once we make the big announcement!
They are building a dragon army.
Or at least the guy they work for is.
I'll bloody his fist with my face if he tries to take my dragon!
translation.ko: 내 드래곤을 탐내면 얼굴로 놈의 주먹을 짓밟아 주겠어!

translation.en: Lower the storm doors! Wait! What is happening?
[Gobber] Come on! You heard the man! Lock it down.
[Stoick] No dragon or Viking sets foot off this island until I give the word!
translation.ko: 드래곤도, 바이킹도 내 허락 없인 못 나간다!

translation.en: Wait, because some guy you knew is stirring up trouble
Because Drago Bludvist is a madman
And if he's built a dragon army, gods help us all.
Get them into their pens! Quickly!
Then, let's ride back out there.
We'll follow those trappers to Drago and talk some sense into him.
It's our duty to keep the peace!
Peace is over, Hiccup. I must prepare you for war.
Dad, if Drago is coming for our dragons,
we can't wait around for him to get here.
Let's go find him and change his mind.
No, some minds won't be changed, Hiccup.
translation.ko: 아니다, 절대 안 바뀌는 생각도 있어

translation.en: Berk is what you need to worry about.
[Stoick] Secure the stables! Latch every stall!
translation.ko: 외양간 지키고 모든 문에 빗장을 걸어!

translation.en: With this wind, we'll reach Drago by daybreak,
translation.ko: 이 정도 바람이면 일출 때 드라고와 만나겠군

translation.en: so best we fill this ship up with dragons, and quick!
It's no time to be picky.
Uh… Eret? Not if we want to keep our…
Net them, lads! Take them down!
You're not getting away this time.
[Eret] And here I was, worried we might turn up empty-handed.
Nope. It's your lucky day. -[gasps] -We give up.
That's one Night Fury, one Deadly Nadder,
and two of the finest dragon riders west of Luk Tuk.
translation.ko: 최고 실력의 드래곤 라이더 두 명

translation.en: That ought to make the boss happy, right?
-[Astrid whispers] What are you doing? -Toothless, stay.
Uh, the dragons don't care for cramped spaces, so they'll just hang out with you.
translation.ko: 드래곤은 비좁은 공간 싫어해 밖에서 어울리도록 해줘

translation.en: You know, wooden boat, big ocean. How is your swimming?
translation.ko: 바다 위의 나무배라! 너 수영 좀 하니?

translation.en: Oops! Almost forgot. You can't have armed prisoners.
Just what every dragon trapper needs.
One end coats the blade in Monstrous Nightmare saliva.
translation.ko: 몬스트러스 나이트메어의 끈끈이 침이 묻은 칼날과

translation.en: The other sprays Hideous Zippleback gas.
All it takes is a spark, and…
[Hiccup] Once they see you as one of their own,
translation.ko: 드래곤이 널 받아준다면 어떤 사나운 드래곤도 길들일 수 있어

translation.en: even the testiest dragons can be trained. Right, bud?
translation.ko: 어떤 사나운 드래곤도 길들일 수 있어 맞지, 친구?

translation.en: [Hiccup] No game. We just wanna meet Drago. [grunts] Why?
Because I'm going to change his mind about dragons.
there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.
translation.ko: 드래곤은 널 위해 뭐든 할 거야

translation.en: [blows raspberry] You won't be changing any minds around here.
translation.ko: 넌 여기 있는 누구의 생각도 못 바꿔

translation.en: See how well I protect and provide?
[grunts] What are you guys doing here?
I don't need to be rescued!
Well, didn't you just pick the wrong ship?
I am Eret, son of [muffled] Eret.
You, saddle up. We're going home.
I'm trying to protect our dragons and stop a war!
translation.ko: 저는 드래곤을 지켜주고 전쟁을 막으려는 거예요

translation.en: Because war is what he wants, son!
Years ago, there was a great gathering of chieftains
to discuss the dragon scourge we all faced.
Into our midst came a stranger from a strange land,
translation.ko: 그런데 수상한 곳에서 온 수상한 자가 나타났어

translation.en: covered in scars and draped in a cloak of dragon skin.
and spoke softly, saying that he,
Drago Bludvist, was a man of the people,
devoted to freeing mankind from the tyranny of dragons.
translation.ko: 드래곤의 폭력에 맞서 인간을 구하러 나섰다더군

translation.en: He claimed that he alone could control the dragons
translation.ko: 오직 자신만이 드래곤을 다룰 수 있고

translation.en: and that he alone could keep us safe,
translation.ko: 오직 자신만이 우릴 구할 수 있댔어

translation.en: if we chose to bow down
Until he wrapped himself in his cloak and cried out,
"Then see how well you do without me!"
The rooftop suddenly burst into flames,
and from it, armored dragons descended,
burning the hall to the ground.
was the only one to escape.
Men who kill without reason cannot be reasoned with.
translation.ko: 이유 없이 죽이는 자와는 절대 대화가 안 통해

translation.en: This is what I'm good at.
And if I could change your mind,
Lead the others back to Berk.
I've had enough mutiny for one day.
I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
translation.ko: 너한테 나쁜 일 안 생기게 할게

translation.en: Hey! You left my dragon back there!
translation.ko: 이봐! 내 드래곤을 내버려 두면 어떡해?

translation.en: He can't fly on his own! He will drown!
Uh, we have to head back for my dragon!
Do you even understand what I'm saying?
Toothless! It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.
I'm glad to see you, too, bud.
-You really had me worried there. -[Toothless grumbles]
No, you were only a babe.
translation.ko: 넌 그때 아기였으니 날 모를 거야

translation.en: Aye, she could never stay put either.
And a Viking. Could there be a worse combination?
translation.ko: 게다가 바이킹이야 더 나쁜 조합이 있을까?

translation.en: [scoffs] When I think of how stubborn and senseless you were back in the day…
Well, not much has changed, actually.
[sighs] Ah, you know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber.
translation.ko: 내 아들 몰라서 그래? 포기란 걸 몰라

translation.en: And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him…
so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury!
translation.ko: 다른 드래곤도 아니고 나이트 퓨리가 있잖아!

translation.en: Hold on. Wait just a minute. -This way! -Come back here!
You can't just say something like that and run off!
You're my mother? I mean, what the…
Do you grasp how insane it sounds?
Where have you been all this time?
But they said you were dead!
Everyone thinks you were eaten by…
This is where you've been for 20 years?
It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank.
It's not every day you find out
your mother is some kind of crazy, feral, vigilante dragon lady.
translation.ko: 과격하고 무자비한 드래곤 보호자일 줄은 몰랐죠

translation.en: At least I'm not boring, right?
I suppose there is that one specific thing.
He might very well be the last of his kind.
Wow. No wonder you get along so well.
How did you manage to… I found him in the woods.
He was shot down and wounded.
This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps.
This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting.
was blinded by a tree snare
and then left to die alone and scared.
Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?
I'm actually the one who shot him down.
He got me back! Right, bud?
You couldn't save all of me, could you?
translation.ko: 나를 차마 온전하게 구해줄 순 없었지?

translation.en: You just had to make it even.
What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?
He didn't take it all that well.
Pretty soon, everyone back home had dragons of their own.
Believe me, I tried, as well,
but people are not capable of change, Hiccup.
Some of us were just born different.
but I believed peace was possible.
translation.ko: 난 평화롭게 만들 수 있다고 믿었어

translation.en: Stop! You'll only make it worse!
[Valka] It was a very unpopular opinion.
[Valka] Then, one night, a dragon broke into our house,
translation.ko: 어느 날 밤, 드래곤이 우리 집에 침입했고

translation.en: was proof of everything I believed.

translation.ko: 난 드래곤의 영혼에서 내 영혼을 보았단다

translation.en: [Valka] You and your father nearly died that night,
all because I couldn't kill a dragon.

translation.ko: 난 그 점은 엄마를 닮았나 봐요

translation.en: It broke my heart to stay away,
but I believed you would be safer if I did.
Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me.
He must have thought I belonged here.
translation.ko: 여기가 내가 있을 곳이라 판단했나 봐

translation.en: In the home of the great Bewilderbeast.
One of the very few that still exist.
but this is the king of all dragons.
With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest.
translation.ko: 멋진 거구로 얼음 숨결을 뿜어 여길 만들었지

translation.en: A safe haven for dragons everywhere.
He's responsible for all that destruction?
We all live under his care and his command.
translation.ko: 우리는 알파의 보호를 받고 명령에 따른단다

translation.en: [Valka] All but the babies, of course,
I've lived among them for 20 years, Hiccup,
Uh. Yeah, I could eat. Good. It's feeding time.
translation.ko: - 네, 배고파요 - 좋아, 밥 먹으러 가자

translation.en: They should have been back with Hiccup by now.
I don't like it either. Eret, son of Eret
was the man of my dreams. My everything!
But, baby, I grew facial hair for you.
What if Drago shot them down?
What if they need our help?
Wait, what? No, but Stoick said…
It doesn't matter what he said, if they have all been captured.
translation.ko: 족장님이 잡혀있다면 그 명령이 무슨 소용이야?

translation.en: [Eret] We have nowhere to go, nothing to sell,
translation.ko: 이젠 돌아갈 곳도 팔아넘길 드래곤도 없어

translation.en: and no heads to call our own!
If we don't turn up with dragons, and fast… [screams]

translation.ko: - 어떻게 좀 해봐! - 에렛의 아들 에렛!
- 그리울 거야, 에렛! - 이건 어떤 상황이지? 납치

translation.en: Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he? [huskily] Can he?
You're gonna show us the way to Drago.
And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.
translation.ko: 거길 몰래 침투하자고? 차라리 날 죽여

translation.en: That could be arranged. Stormfly, drop it!
Okay! I'll take you to Drago!
Hey, I thought we were going to eat.
Then, from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago…
translation.ko: 드래곤 아일랜드를 시작으로 많은 섬을 발견했어요

translation.en: I don't even feel the cold. I just feel…
[inhales] This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup.
translation.ko: 드래곤이 된 기분이 이런 걸 거야

translation.en: It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon,
We just about had it that time!
All this time, you took after me.
Will you give me another chance?
I can teach you all that I have learned these past 20 years.
Now you can make those tight turns.
translation.ko: 급히 꺾는 비행도 이젠 잘될 거야

translation.en: And I'll show them all to you.
translation.ko: 모든 드래곤들에겐 비밀이 있단다 그걸 모두 너한테 보여줄게

translation.en: This gift we share, Hiccup, it bonds us.
This is who you are, son.
We will change the world for all dragons.
We will make it a better, safer place.
translation.ko: 더 멋지고 안전한 세상을 만들 수 있어

translation.en: Yeah. I mean… That sounds amazing.
Now you and I can go talk to Drago together.
Come on, we should be getting back.
Okay! Look, I got you here. Now get this thing off me.
Never take a toy from a dragon.
Why does this keep happening to me?

translation.ko: 거대한 물거품을 만들고 거대한 폐를 가졌으며

translation.en: I'm thinking class-five leviathan, maybe six.
[Eret chuckles] Always great to see you, my friend!
Well, as you can see, I'm right on time with a new batch of dragons,
translation.ko: 시간을 딱 맞춰서 새 드래곤을 잡아 왔어요

translation.en: I also caught you their riders.
Turns out, there is a whole bunch of them out there.
Drago doesn't have them after all.
[choking] My men are hunting them down as we speak.
They won't know where you're hiding, I promise you that.
Yes, they will. They know we're missing,
If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna kick--
translation.ko: 우리를 건드리기만 하면 곧 히컵이 나타나서...

translation.en: He's only the son of Stoick the Vast, his heir to the throne of Berk,
and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!
translation.ko: 이 세상에 둘도 없는 최고의 드래곤 마스터죠

translation.en: And unless you let us go, right now,
he will blast through here on his Night Fury
and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters.
Then they will be crying like babies.
Funny and beautiful. Good one, babe!
First, there was one rider, and now, all of Berk.
And you led them to me!
We must attack the dragon riders' nest at once!
We will take down their alpha!
Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place.
translation.ko: 드라고가 침략할 때까지 기다릴 순 없어

translation.en: Are you kidding me? How did you get in here?
The same way we are getting you out.
translation.ko: 우리가 널 데리고 나갈 길로 왔지

translation.en: Wait. There's something you need to know.
[Stoick] Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.
This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually.
Yeah, just add it to the pile.
Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like.
You just have to handle it delicately. So…
You might want to take this one.
translation.ko: 이건 자네가 봐야 할 것 같아

translation.en: could you put the sword away, please?
I know what you're gonna say, Stoick.
How could I have done this?
Stayed away all of these years?
And why did I not come back to you?
What sign did I have that you could change, Stoick?
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 보고 당신이 바뀔 거라고 생각하고

translation.en: I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting,
to find another answer, but did any of you listen?
translation.ko: 그토록 말했건만 내 말을 듣기나 했어?

translation.en: This is why I never married.
I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone,
translation.ko: 홀로 히컵을 키우게 당신을 두고 떠났지만

translation.en: but I thought he would be better off without me.
translation.ko: 내가 없으면 히컵이 더 안전할 거라고 생각했어

translation.en: And I was wrong, I see that now, but…

translation.ko: 소리치든, 비명을 지르든 무슨 말이라도 해!

translation.en: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you.
[Snotlout] Could this day get any worse?
We're gonna jump into freezing cold water, then die from drowning.
translation.ko: 우린 곧 얼음물에 빠져 죽을 거야

translation.en: You are a steaming heap of dragon…
Get them, you son of an Eret.
So, are we going to save your dragons and get out of here, or not?
translation.ko: 드래곤을 구해서 빠져나갈 거야, 말 거야?

translation.en: [Eret] Check every trap. They're here somewhere.
I don't know. You just keep doing what you are doing.
Thank you for saving my life.
Now let me return the favor.
Mom, you'd never even recognize it.
Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing-slings.
translation.ko: 무기 만들던 데서 안장과 치료 도구를 만들어요

translation.en: You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed.
Your son has changed Berk for the better.
I think we did well with this one, Val.
[Stoick chuckles] Oh, I got it. I got it.
I'm a little out of practice.
-I didn't marry you for your cooking. -[Gobber] I hope not.
Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle-axe.
translation.ko: 네 엄마가 만든 미트볼은 큰 도끼보다 치명적이었어

translation.en: I've still got a few knocking around in here. [laughs]
translation.ko: 옛날에 먹은 게 지금도 속에서 부글거려

translation.en: And once you move back in, with all your dragons…
Drago won't even stand a chance.
Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.
translation.ko: 너무 앞서가지 마라 시간이 필요할 거다

translation.en: ♪ I'll swim and sail on savage seas ♪
translation.ko: 거센 바다에서 헤엄을 치고 항해할 거야

translation.en: ♪ With ne'er a fear of drowning ♪
♪ And gladly ride the waves of life ♪
♪ Will stop me on my journey ♪
♪ If you will promise me your heart ♪
♪ But I've no need of mighty deeds ♪
translation.ko: 하지만 멋진 행동까지 보여주진 않아도 돼

translation.en: ♪ When I feel your arms around me ♪
translation.ko: 나를 감싸는 당신의 팔 그거면 충분해

translation.en: ♪ But I would bring you rings of gold ♪
♪ I'd even sing you poetry ♪ Whoo! Oh, would you?
♪ And I would keep you from all harm ♪
♪ If you would stay beside me ♪
♪ I have no use for rings of gold ♪ ♪ I care not for your poetry ♪
translation.ko: 황금 반지를 안 줘도 좋아 시를 안 읽어도 좋아

translation.en: ♪ I only want your hand to hold ♪
♪ I only want you near me ♪
[Stoick and Valka] ♪ To love and kiss, to sweetly hold ♪
♪ For the dancing and the dreaming ♪
♪ Through all life's sorrows and delights ♪
translation.ko: - 슬플 때나 기쁠 때나 - 일어나, 히컵!

translation.en: ♪ I'll keep your love inside me ♪
♪ I will swim and sail on savage seas ♪
♪ With ne'er a fear of drowning ♪
♪ And gladly ride the waves of life ♪
I thought I would have to die before we could have that dance again.
translation.ko: 죽기 전에는 이 춤을 다신 못 출 줄 알았어

translation.en: Will you be my wife once again?
We can be a family! What do you say?
Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son.
translation.ko: 히컵이 내 말을 안 듣고 여기까지 와서

translation.en: We never would have found each other.
Val! It's all right, it's all right.
We're a team now. What do you want to do?
translation.ko: 우리가 다시 뭉쳤잖아 어떻게 하길 원해?

translation.en: We have to save the dragons.
Aye. You got it! Come on, son.
Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain.
We need to draw the alpha out.
You really are full of surprises!
Oh, you know, catching up with Mom.
Now you know where I get my dramatic flair.
The alpha! Now we have a fight!
Show them what you got, bud.
I've waited a long time for this!
They are controlled by the alpha!
Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger.
[Fishlegs] That is a class ten! Class ten!
[Drago] Come on! Take down the alpha!
translation.ko: - 안 돼 - 가라! 놈들의 알파를 꺾어라!

translation.en: Val, do you think you can stop them?
translation.ko: 두 알파를 멈추게 할 수 있어?
네가 불타는 모습을 두 눈으로 봤는데!

translation.en: It takes more than a little fire to kill me!
translation.ko: 그 정도 화력으론 날 못 죽여!

translation.en: This is the great dragon master?
The son of Stoick the Vast?
All of this loss, and for what?
I know what it is to live in fear.
translation.ko: 두려움에 빠져 사는 게 어떤 건지 알아

translation.en: I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons
and liberate the people of this world.
Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.
Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.
To control those who follow you,
and to get rid of those who won't.
And we have the answer back on Berk.
No dragon can resist the alpha's command.
translation.ko: 모든 드래곤은 알파의 명령을 거역 못 해

translation.en: So, he who controls the alpha
Toothless, you okay, bud? What's going on?
The strength of will over others.
What did he just tell you?
No, no, no, no. Come on.
What are you doing? Knock it off.
Go on! Get out of here!
It's not his fault. You know that.
under the control of bad people…
Gather the men and meet me at Berk!
and lead you through Odin's great battlefield.
May they sing your name with love and fury
translation.ko: 그들이 사랑과 분노로 자네 이름을 노래하여

translation.en: so that we might hear it rise from the depths of Valhalla
translation.ko: 발할라 계곡에 그 이름이 울려 퍼지길

translation.en: and know that you have taken your rightful place
For a great man has fallen.
I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be.
And I'm not the peacekeeper I thought I was.
translation.ko: 스스로 자부하던 대로 평화의 수호자도 아니고요

translation.en: You came early into this world.
You were such a wee thing.
I feared you wouldn't make it.
He always said you would become the strongest of them all.
You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon.
translation.ko: 넌 족장의 심장과 드래곤의 영혼을 가졌단다

translation.en: Only you can bring our worlds together.
translation.ko: 이 세상을 평화롭게 만들 유일한 사람

translation.en: That is who you are, son.
I was so afraid of becoming my dad.
Mostly because I thought I never could.
translation.ko: 절대 아버지처럼 못 될 것 같았거든요

translation.en: How do you become someone that great?
I guess you can only try.
But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?
They're babies. They don't listen to anyone.
translation.ko: 아기 드래곤은 누구 말도 듣지 않아

translation.en: Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.
translation.ko: 누가 우리를 보면 아마 비웃을 거야!

translation.en: It's a good thing that I never listen.
translation.ko: 제가 남의 말을 안 들어서 다행이네요

translation.en: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's…
No one can protect you now.
Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off Toothless.
translation.ko: 투슬리스를 조종 못 하게 알파의 시선을 끌어

translation.en: Have you forgotten who you're riding with?
There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle!
You certainly are hard to get rid of, I'll say that.
It's me. I'm right here, bud.
He will not miss a second time.
translation.ko: 녀석이 두 번 실패하는 일은 없을 거야

translation.en: Please. You are my best friend, bud.
We need to get those two apart.
We gotta block him out, Toothless.
Now let's try this one more time!
This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.
translation.ko: 드래곤의 신뢰를 얻는 건 바로 이런 거야

translation.en: You never cease to amaze me, bud.
Toothless, you know that doesn't wash out!
Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy!
Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang.
You are! Yes, you are! I missed you!
That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there.
You know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.
Your father would be every bit as proud as I am.
translation.ko: 네 아버지도 나만큼이나 네가 자랑스러울 거야

translation.en: I'm really glad you're here, Mom.
I told you it was in here.
Still doing that one? That's hilarious.
translation.ko: 자꾸 누르고 싶은 거지? 참 재미있다

translation.en: [all chanting] Long live the chief! Long live the chief! Long live the chief!
A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice,
[Hiccup] Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy.
[Hiccup] We may be small in numbers,
bigger than anything the world can pit against us.
We are the voice of peace.
And, bit by bit, we will change this world.
[Hiccup] You see, we have something they don't.
Oh, sure, they have armies, and they have armadas,
translation.ko: 그들에겐 군대가 있고 거대한 함대가 있지만
